MouseEventClientY.summary: The clientY read-only property of the interface provides the vertical coordinate within the application's {{glossary("viewport")}} at which the event occurred (as opposed to the coordinate within the page).

remarks.para: For example, clicking on the top edge of the viewport will always result in a mouse event with a clientY value of 0, regardless of whether the page is scrolled vertically.

MouseEventClientY.value: A double floating point value in pixels.
